name: CMU SIO
description: two month user interface design and development

overview.text: Carnegie Mellonâ€™s Student Information Online (SIO) is constantly critized for its displeasing design and confusing user flow. For this project, I redesigned the course registration and scheduling feature of the site. From initial rapid prototyping to heuristic evaluation, the interface undertook several iterations between Figma to deployment. While still a work in progress, the recreation offers an alternative and intuitive design for course catalog and registration.
